title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. I, pt. 8 - Release Of Information To Inmate Families And The News Media
content:

State Regulations
§ 8.1 - Policy
§ 8.2 - Immediate family members
§ 8.3 - News media
§ 8.4 to 8.8 - Repealed
§ 8.9 - Repealed
§ 8.10 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. I, pt. 8

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§ 29[2], 112

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
